title: Job Openings at Morris Royal Security Limited
content:
Morris Royal Security Limited is a team of experienced security and law enforcement professionals with a specialization in Enterprise Risk Management. We leverage on our solid organizational structure, dedicated workforce, constantly improving technologies and techniques and strong quality assurance processes to deliver superior services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Business and Client Relationship Officer

Job Location: Opic Isheri, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee the marketing and sales process to attract new clients.
	Facilitate driving the sales of the company’s products/services to be able to compete effectively in an increasingly competitive market.
	Ensure successful communication with all areas of the business.
	Maintaining a robust client relationship feedback mechanism.
	Strong team mentality
	Good understanding of the industry and help the business grow social media product sales.
	Work in collaboration with the team, developing good working relationships.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND, HND or B.Sc qualification
	Candidates Must reside within Ikeja, Maryland, Ojota, Ketu, Ojodu Berger, Ogba Aguda, Akute, Magboro, and Mowe Ibafo axis.
	Experience: 1 - 5 years of work experience
	A male or female business officer is needed to take charge and direct the affairs of the business.
	Excellent customer service and communication skills.
	Outstanding analytical and presentation skills.
	Ability to generate original ideas.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 30th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: administrator@morrisroyalsecurity.com.ng or hrmorrisroyal@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

3.) Security Deployment / Recruitment Officer

Job Location: Opic Isheri, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Search, recruit able bodied cadets to fill vacancies at various locations
	Ensure availability of mentally, emotionally and physically fit guards to fill vacancies at all times.
	Reduce risks that could accrue to the organisation in case of guard misconduct.
	Obtain vacancy information from all locations
	Ensure filling of all employment related formsprovided Proper and diligent documentation of all guards
	Approve and recommend evaluated guards for training after due recruitment process
	Coordinate deployment & posting of guards
	Update and maintain proper records/documentation of existing guards
	Maintain record of both old and new staff for safe keeping, confidentiality and easy retrieval
	Conduct background checks and verification on all guards
	Prepare vetting reports to the highest standard
	Conduct interviews with candidates where necessary to clarify information
	Perform any other duties as may be delegated from time to time.


Requirements


	HND or B.Sc Degree in any Management course, Social Sciences or relevant studies
	Security professional certification would be an added advantage
	Must have no criminal record
	Critical thinking skills
	Must possess good communication skills and ability to manage people effectively.


Application Closing Date:31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: administrator@morrisroyalsecurity.com.ng or hrmorrisroyal@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
